haxel.HxlMouse

type
class

Constructor

public new()
Constructor.

Instance Variables

private ImgDefaultCursor : Class<flash.display.Bitmap>

private _current : Int

Helper variable for tracking whether the mouse was just pressed or just released.

private _last : Int

Helper variable for tracking whether the mouse was just pressed or just released.

private _out : Bool

Helper for mouse visibility.

public cursor : HxlSprite

Graphical representation of the mouse pointer.

public screenX : Int

Current X position of the mouse pointer on the screen.

public screenY : Int

Current Y position of the mouse pointer on the screen.

public x : Int

Current X position of the mouse pointer in the game world.

public y : Int

Current Y position of the mouse pointer in the game world.

Instance Methods

public handleMouseDown(event : flash.events.MouseEvent) : Void

parameters
event A MouseEvent object.
Event handler so FlxGame can toggle the mouse.

public handleMouseOut(event : flash.events.MouseEvent) : Void

parameters
event A MouseEvent object.
Event handler so FlxGame can toggle the mouse.

public handleMouseOver(event : flash.events.MouseEvent) : Void

parameters
event A MouseEvent object.
Event handler so FlxGame can toggle the mouse.

public handleMouseUp(event : flash.events.MouseEvent) : Void

parameters
event A MouseEvent object.
Event handler so FlxGame can toggle the mouse.

public hide() : Void

Hides the mouse cursor

public justPressed() : Bool

returns
Whether the mouse was just pressed.
Check to see if the mouse was just pressed.

public justReleased() : Bool

returns
Whether the mouse was just released.
Check to see if the mouse was just released.

public load(Graphic : Class<flash.display.Bitmap>, ?XOffset : Int, ?YOffset : Int) : Void

parameters
Graphic The image you want to use for the cursor.
XOffset The number of pixels between the mouse's screen position and the graphic's top left corner.
YOffset The number of pixels between the mouse's screen position and the graphic's top left corner.
Load a new mouse cursor graphic

public pressed() : Bool

returns
Whether the mouse is pressed.
Check to see if the mouse is pressed.

public reset() : Void

Resets the just pressed/just released flags and sets mouse to not pressed.

public show(?Graphic : Class<flash.display.Bitmap>, ?XOffset : Int, ?YOffset : Int) : Void

parameters
Graphic The image you want to use for the cursor.
XOffset The number of pixels between the mouse's screen position and the graphic's top left corner.
YOffset The number of pixels between the mouse's screen position and the graphic's top left corner.
Either show an existing cursor or load a new one.

public unload() : Void

Unload the current cursor graphic. If the current cursor is visible, then the default system cursor is loaded up to replace the old one.

public update(X : Int, Y : Int, XScroll : Float, YScroll : Float) : Void

parameters
X The current X position of the mouse in the window.
Y The current Y position of the mouse in the window.
XScroll The amount the game world has scrolled horizontally.
YScroll The amount the game world has scrolled vertically.
Called by the internal game loop to update the mouse pointer's position in the game world. Also updates the just pressed/just released flags.
